summary.span: 表示定义数据点、序列和空点所共有的自定义属性。

span.span: Represents the custom properties that are common to data points, series and empty points.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类定义如颜色、 背景图像、 阴影，等使用的自定义属性。This class defines custom properties such as colors, the use of background images, hatching, and so forth. 类，类和属性派生自此类。The class, class and the property are all derived from this class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 获取或设置数据点、序列或空点的 X 轴标签的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text of the X-axis label for the data point, series or an empty point.

summary.span: 仅当尚未指定相关 对象的自定义标签时，才使用此属性。

span.span: This property is only used if a custom label has not been specified for the relevant object.
The text of the X-axis label.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅可以在运行时设置此属性对象。This property can only be set at run time for a object. 如果设置此属性或对象时，其所有数据点的将使用此标签。If you set this property or a object, all of its data points will use this label. 如果未设置属性和自定义标签尚未指定，将使用轴刻度自动生成轴标签。If the property is not set and a custom label has not been specified, an axis label will be generated automatically using the axis scale. 使用设置空点标签属性。Empty point labels are set using the property.
